definition: to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: Atcheson's company and its competitors screen the driving records of prospective borrowers.
sentences.chinese: 艾奇逊的公司和屏幕准借款人的驾驶记录其竞争对手。

sentences.english: The borrower shall pay interest on each interest payment day.
sentences.chinese: 借款人须于每一付息日当日付息。

sentences.english: Article 205 The borrower shall pay the interest at the prescribed time.
sentences.chinese: 第二百零五条借款人应当按照约定的期限支付利息。

sentences.english: Article 205 The borrower shall pay the interest within the contracted time limit.
sentences.chinese: 第二百零五条借款人应当按照约定的期限支付利息。

sentences.english: The Borrower will be notified by a letter to confirm the terms and conditions of the Loan.
sentences.chinese: 借款人将获专函通知其贷款之各项信贷条款。

sentences.english: The Borrower fails to pay any amount payable thereunder as and when such amount shall become payable.
sentences.chinese: 借款人未能支付根据该协议规定到期应付的款项。

sentences.english: Do they borrow money from an informal money lender?
sentences.chinese: 他们是否从非正式借款人那里借钱？

sentences.english: "covenant-lite" loans, which imposed few restrictions on borrowers, were all the rage.
sentences.chinese: 对借款人几乎没有限制的“低门槛”贷款风靡一时。

sentences.english: Thus, the borrower's property is not under any risk of repossession .
sentences.chinese: 因此，借款人的财产不能收回任何风险。

sentences.english: The trustee shall inform timely the borrower of the replacement of the loan servicer.
sentences.chinese: 受托机构更换贷款服务机构应及时通知借款人。

sentences.english: A lower-rated borrower could pay more than 20%.
sentences.chinese: 而较低评级的借款人需要支付比此高出20%的利息。

sentences.english: The borrower shall pay the interest at the prescribed time.
sentences.chinese: 第二百零五条借款人应当按照约定的期限支付利息。

sentences.english: Britain gained this reprieve because it has some things going for it as a sovereign borrower.
sentences.chinese: 因为国家是借款人的特殊原因，英国政府获得了缓刑。

sentences.english: Borrower who changes job must return borrowed reserve fund before he leaves the post.
sentences.chinese: 借款人工作变迁时必须在变迁前交还借用的备用金。

sentences.english: Article 206 The borrower shall repay the principal at the prescribed time.
sentences.chinese: 第二百零六条借款人应当按照约定的期限返还借款。

sentences.english: Not all of those borrowers can be saved.
sentences.chinese: 并非所有这些借款人都能受到救助。
